short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make email & task management easy, with beSlick for Gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
beSlick provides simple task management for you and your team, built on powerful workflow software for your business.

All in one platform at www.beslick.com

Use the 'beSlick for Gmail' Chrome Extension to:
  • Add emails as tasks in beSlick with one click
  • Then reassign, prioritize, add due dates or steps for others to do
  • Complete all your tasks directly in Gmail
